entities.name: wood
entities.description: The person who is holding up a large diagram of a Quidditch pitch. He is launching into a speech about his new tactics.

entities.name: quidditch pitch
entities.description: A place where the sport of Quidditch is played. It has many lines, arrows and crosses drawn on it in different-coloured inks.

entities.name: fred weasley
entities.description: One of the people who are listening to Wood's speech. His head droops onto Alicia Spinnet's shoulder.

entities.name: alicia spinnet
entities.description: The person whose shoulder Fred Weasley's head is on. She is also listening to Wood's speech.

relationships.description: Wood is holding up a large diagram of the Quidditch pitch.
Wood is launching into a speech about his new tactics, and Fred Weasley is listening.
Fred Weasley's head droops onto Alicia Spinnet's shoulder.
